content:
§oLet's get cracking, shall we?§r

The §3Oil Cracking Unit§r is a multiblock meant to make cracked fluids. It has all the recipes of §3Chemical Reactor§r Cracking, but it is §6lossless§r.

This multiblock is §doptional§r, but it saves a lot of Fuel in the long term!

Higher Coil tiers provide small energy discount, not too important.
